Class InfoBar

java.lang.Object
InfoBar
public class InfoBar
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the information bar in the upper left corner of the game window. It includes : the current life of the player, the current points of the player, and the FPS of the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.awt.Color color
    This is color of the String to be drawn
    private java.awt.Font font
    This is font of the String to be drawn
    private java.lang.String FPSinfo
    This variable is the information of the game's FPS
    private Game game
    This class is the information bar of the Game object.
    private int height
    The height of the background image.
    private java.lang.String lifeInfo
    This variable is the information of the current player's life
    private Player player
    The current player of the game.
    private java.lang.String pointsInfo
    This variable is the information of the current player's points
    private int width
    The width of the background image.
    private float x
    The x-coordinate of the InfoBar.
    private float y
    The y-coordinate of the InfoBar.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
    This function draws the image of the information bar and the information about points, life and FPS.
    void tick()
    This function gets the life and points of the player and the FPS value of the game.

  • Field Details

    • game

      private Game game
      This class is the information bar of the Game object. The game is used to get the FPS value.

    • player

      private Player player
      The current player of the game. The player is used to get the information about the points and life.

    • x

      private float x
      The x-coordinate of the InfoBar.

    • y

      private float y
      The y-coordinate of the InfoBar.

    • width

      private final int width
      The width of the background image. The width is constant, so it is a final variable.

    • height

      private final int height
      The height of the background image. The height is constant, so it is a final variable.

    • color

      private java.awt.Color color
      This is color of the String to be drawn

    • font

      private java.awt.Font font
      This is font of the String to be drawn

    • lifeInfo

      private java.lang.String lifeInfo
      This variable is the information of the current player's life

    • pointsInfo

      private java.lang.String pointsInfo
      This variable is the information of the current player's points

    • FPSinfo

      private java.lang.String FPSinfo
      This variable is the information of the game's FPS
